6383.bart_summary: The 2015 Australian Fashion Report assessed the labour rights management systems of 59 companies and 219 brands operating in Australia. Lowes, Industrie, Best & Less and the Just Group - which includes Just Jeans, Portmans and Dotti - were identified as some of the worst performing companies. Amongst the best performers were Etiko, Audrey Blue, Cotton On, H&M and Zara. The report comes almost two years after over 1,100 Bangladeshi garment workers died when the Rana Plaza factory collapsed.
